title: Parkking App
description: A responsive application for booking parking spaces, built with dart and Flutter. with multiple apis like Google Maps firebase payment api systems and more.

title: Bird Hunt Game published on Google Play Store
description: A game where you avoid projectiles as a bird, ssimplistic game built with C# and Unity. It was available on the Google Play Store but due to inactivity it was shut down. did all the processes to publish a game and processes for ad revenue
